name: RIVER'S END
description:
The Romans landed on Britannia with a simple mission: kill the head priestess of the nearby cult and pave the way for Caesar's conquest. But the elusive savages countered hard and fast, tearing the invaders to shreds with inhuman, beast-like ferocity, until only a handful remained.

The sole survivor of his unit, one lone centurion ventures deeper into the strange woods, intent on finishing the mission by himself if necessary. But, as he battles the fearless hordes of native Celts, the endless cycle of violence begins tearing into his mortal soul, and he questions whether the seemingly erratic cult may offer some truth after all...

--------

Controls :

Arrow keys/ Joystick : Move

X key / X button : Attack

C key / Right bumper : Slide (You are invulnerable while sliding)

A key / Y button : Throw spear

Space bar / A button : Jump

Hold down arrow / joystick and jump to go down branches.

F / B button : Continue dialogue

Escape : Pause menu (then F / B Button to quit)
